string-array.name: bill_rpt_save
string-array.item: Without deleting any bill and create new bills, if required.
Delete and recreate bills using the new recurring changes. Bills belonging to this recurring settings will only be effected.

string-array.name: bill_rpt_remove
string-array.item: For this and all related bills.

resources.string: Business or household name for bookkeeping.
No profile exists, please create a new profile.
Profile \'%1$s\' and all the data in it will be deleted. \nContinue?
No, this is not possible..!! \nBecause this is the only profile available in this app and you need at lease one profile to work with.
Touch here to change profile photo
This version of app supports single profile only. So please delete any unwanted profiles or upgrade to PREMIUM version to keep using multiple profiles.

Profile is an organized collection of data, like a storage or accounts book (not bank account). The data (bills, categories, labels) belonging to one profile is stored at one place and never mixed up with that of other profile\'s data. \n\nSo it will give you more control and better management. Example: one profile for personal expenses, and another for your office or business spending.
Max profile limit reached for trial version, please upgrade to create more data profiles.
Duplicate backup name, please provide another backup name or delete existing..!
Invalid backup name \'%1$s\'. \n\nAvoid using spaces and special characters such as: \\ /
Backup failed..! Please ensure there is enough of free storage space.
Backup / Restore in progress, please be patience..!
Restore failed..! Please try later after sometime.
Restore would take a few seconds to couple of minutes, so please be patience depending on your backup size. \n\nClick continue to choose a external backup file to import and restore data from.
Backup your App data and attachments to Google Drive. You can restore them when you reinstall the app, change phone, or copy data onto another device.
Add a Google account to store latest backups. Enabling Backup to Google Drive will overwrite existing app backup on the Google Drive, so please mind it when using on multiple devices.
Successfully restored from the backup. \n\nApp needs to be re-launched in order to apply new data.
Backup can take a few seconds to minutes depending on the app data size, so please be patient. \n\nContinue creation of a backup?

Restore would take a few seconds to couple of minutes, so please be patience. \n\nAll your existing App data on this device will be replaced from the last backup. Do you want to continue with the restore operation?
For security purpose you can set a PIN to start the app. Once set, you will be asked for the PIN every time the app starts up
Touch here to change your 4 digit PIN.
App\'s landing page that shows up when the app is launched.
Tick to use two level categories
Currency that is pre populated while adding any new record, for this profile.
To create, delete, or change currency of any other profile.
Notify me about bills that were marked to do so. (unselect to disable)
Notifications are now disabled. (select to enable)
Notifications are popped up at this time, on daily basis
For new bills, this is pre selected as daily reminder notification option. example: 5 days before due date
Recurring Bills will be auto generated in advance until the period specified. example: 3 month in advance
Click here to view list of generated PDF files. Whenever a PDF report is generated they are cached by the app where you can view, share, delete them as per your needs.
Backups will now contain data and also attached receipt photos, as in a full backup
Quick backup is active, so backups will includes data only and ignores any attached photos

Select an Google Drive account to store all your application data backups. Enabling Backup to Google Drive will overwrite any existing copy on your Google Drive, so please mind it when using on multiple devices.
Do you want to unlink your Google Drive account? So your data won\'t be backed up to the cloud storage.
Enable to perform Google Drive backup via WiFi only. Untick to use both WiFi and mobile internet data.
Please try again or contact developer about the issue.
An issue has been fixed automatically. \n\nPlease restart the app and you are good to go.
No recurring configurations exists. \n(Touch floating \'+\' button to create one)
Please select a recurring configuration from the left side frame.

Bills Reminder helps you to organise and track your bills both paid / unpaid and payable / receivable. Simply add a bill into this app and it will remind daily about it, until you have marked it as paid or removed it. Bills marked as recurring are automatically created based on supplied configurations and forecast period, thus giving you complete peace of mind.
The version contains basic features to manage your bills\n

string-array.name: feature_items_free
string-array.item: Dashboard overview of bills for each month
Multiple selection: deletion of multiple bills and categories
Multiple selection: copy multiple bills and categories
Reports: Category wise bills for each month
Scan a barcode and add it to bill notes
Add a bill payment url to the bill
Create backup, including attached receipt photos

resources.string:
This includes all the features provided by 'Free Trial' 
			+
Below PREMIUM features:

string-array.name: feature_items_pro
string-array.item: Delete recurring bills and its configuration in one go. (bulk deletion)
Multiple selection: change category of multiple bills
Multiple selection: change reminder notification of bills
Dashboard overview for each Day, Week, Month and Year.
View bills for each Day, Week, Month, Year and custom period
Reports: Category wise bills for each Day, Week, Month, Year and custom period
Reports: Comparison between Weeks, Days, Months, Years
Reports: Generate PDF reports and sharing
Share and export backups via email, Drive, Dropbox
Restore local backups and downloaded from cloud

resources.string: This requires PREMIUM version.\nHelps you can maintain multiple profiles, where each profile deals with its own data. For example, separate your personal expenses to that of your business spending. So each profile has its own:\n

string-array.name: feature_items_multiprof
string-array.item: Reports and other screens will consider bills from its own profile
This will enable profile management features

resources.string: This is free trial version of Bills Reminder App and you can buy below upgrades to enjoy the app to its best.
Enter bill details and save. Also supports recurring bills and change currency.
Go paperless by attaching the bill receipt along with the bill details.
Get a quick glance of upcoming, overdue, unpaid and paid bills.
View bills for each period and easily swipe between tabs. Example: for each month.
Dashboard, categories & subcategories, calendar, multiple currency, reports & charts, multiple profile, backup and restore.
Recurring configurations helps to easily create, update, delete bills and recurring bills.
Change notification time, recurring bills forecast period, change default currency and many more.
We work days and nights, to give you the best app experience, adding new features, fixing defects. Please support our development - buy us a coffee.
Click burger icon to view other screens
Click \'+\' floating button to add a bill reminder
Number of bills exceeded maximum limit, please upgrade to add more bills.
Number of categories exceeded maximum limit, please upgrade to add more categories.
No payments made on this bill yet.\n(Touch to add a payment)
%1$s remaining to pay on total due of %2$s
Mark as paid, view or add bill payments …
Exceeded maximum number of contacts, please upgrade to add more.
Current forecast period is set to %1$s.
Meaning, recurring entries will be automatically created up until %1$s.
No Attachments exists, tap above buttons to add a photo or a file to this entry.
Click here to edit or delete any account.
Just tap to view the account transactions.
View account details to set a monthly budget.
Link your Google account to keep your data backed up in Google Drive storage.
No Contact exists. \n(Touch the floating button to add one)
No contact group exists. \n(Touch the floating button to create one)
